title: Strengthening E-Learning Practical Competencies: Team Competency Improvement Process Through Collaborative Learning Analysis

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can identify three or more core indicators of team capability by analyzing collaborative learning log data.
Learners can generate personalized feedback reports and propose learning strategy improvements using collaborative analysis tools.
Design and apply effective teamwork strategies in the scientific problem-solving process
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
